entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:36 a.m. EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning and late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
